code: import React from'react';import BigCalendar from'react-big-calendar';import events from'../events';import moment from'moment';var localizer=BigCalendar.momentLocalizer(moment);var Popup=function Popup(){return React.createElement("div",{className:"app-calendar app-cul-calendar animated slideInUpTiny animation-duration-3"},React.createElement("h3",{className:"callout"},"Click the \"+x more\" link on any calendar day that cannot fit all the days events to see an inline popup of all the events."),React.createElement(BigCalendar,{popup:true,localizer:localizer,events:events,defaultDate:new Date(2015,3,1)}));};export default Popup;
